changeSet.author: wube
changeSet.sql: create table odos_crrs_svc.room_ref_value ( room_ref_value_id serial not null, col_value varchar(200) not null, conf_rm_id serial not null references odos_crrs_svc.conf_rm (conf_rm_id), room_ref_id serial not null references odos_crrs_svc.room_ref_columns (room_ref_id), primary key (room_ref_id) );
